content: make your own crochet baubles with this free pattern for beautiful christmas decorations i made my decorative baubles in cotton sportsweight yarn but the pattern is suitable for light dk yarn as well just match your hook to your yarn **materials** scheepjes cotton 8 or scheepjes catona small amounts in assorted colours crochet hook - 2 5mm christmas ball - 3 in circumference use some from last years decorations yarn needle to sew your ball together you could use any 4ply/sport weight cotton yarn if you use a dk weight yarn and a 3 5mm hook you will probably eliminate the last 2 row in order for crochet piece to fit pattern gives instructions to make 2 pieces halves which you sew together over your ball a free version of the us crochet pattern is available on my blog free version on my blog 1 you can find free pdf downloads of translations from kind ravelry menbers on my blog also **includes a french translation from corentine** **includes a dutch translation from jeannette kemp** 1 https //www anniedesigncrochet com/free-christmas-baubles-pattern/
